Html:
Hi,
I am trying to translate a string to a FTS query. (Full Text Search)
Can Irony assist me in it?
Can I use one of the examples in the archive I just downloaded to see it?
Thanks.

here's a link to original article about this:
http://www.sqlservercentral.com/articles/Full-Text+Search+(2008)/64248/
Irony samples include FTS grammar/converter with up-to-date code (synced with latest version of Irony)
